original_text: I saw it as it attacked the sheep. It was so angry that it hit the sheep very hard. It broke off the sheep's two horns. The sheep had no power to stop the goat. The goat knocked the sheep down to the ground and it stamped on the sheep. Nobody could save the sheep from the power of the goat.
korean_text: 내가 본즉 그것이 숫양에게로 가까이 나아가서는 더욱 성내어 그 숫양을 쳐서 그 두 뿔을 꺾으나 숫양에게는 그것을 대적할 힘이 없으므로 그것이 숫양을 땅에 엎드러뜨리고 짓밟았으나 숫양을 그 손에서 벗어나게 할 자가 없었더라

sentences.original_text: I saw it as it attacked the sheep.
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 그것이 양을 공격하는 것을 보았다.

sentences.original_text: that it hit the sheep very hard.
sentences.korean_translation: 그리하여 그것은 양을 아주 세게 쳤다.

sentences.original_text: It broke off the sheep's two horns.
The goat knocked the sheep down to the ground
and it stamped on the sheep.

sentences.korean_translation: 아무도 그 양을 구할 수 없었다.

sentences.original_text: from the power of the goat.
